graph.original_query: Make an amazing LLM Chat UI Interface, add some simuilated chats between LLM and human as well, including image or chart example in the chat. Show header, siderbar and make it in dark theme. (HTML/JS/CSS). This is an expensive project, so need as many design elements as possible. CALL CODERAGENT ONLY ONCE! CODERAGENT CAN DO EVERYTHIN IN 1 ITERATION!. In the demo chat, show atleast 10-15 interactions. Show chart in the chatwindow. Chat window should be scrollable. There should be a chat history shown on the left sidebar (which should be collapsable). Show dropdown to change the LLM Model as well. Also don't use random names for things, use realisting examples for chat names, etc.. Make it look as if designed professionally for a VC pitch.. show off!! REMEMBER TO CALL CODERAGENT ONLY ONCE!

nodes.description: Generate HTML/JS/CSS code for LLM Chat UI with simulated chats, chart, and dark theme.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Create an HTML/JS/CSS-based LLM chat UI interface with the following features:

1.  **Dark Theme:** Implement a dark color scheme for a visually appealing and modern aesthetic.
2.  **Header:** Include a header section with a title (e.g., "AI Chat Interface").
3.  **Collapsible Sidebar:** Create a sidebar on the left that can be collapsed to save screen space.  This sidebar should contain chat history, with realistic chat names (e.g., "Project Brainstorm," "Marketing Strategy").
4.  **Chat Window:** A scrollable chat window displaying simulated conversations between an LLM and a human. Include 10-15 realistic interactions.  Simulate a variety of queries and responses demonstrating the LLM's capabilities. Make chat names realistic, and do not use placeholders. Incorporate an example image or chart within the chat (e.g., a bar chart showing project progress or a data visualization).
5.  **LLM Model Dropdown:** Add a dropdown menu to allow users to select different LLM models (e.g., "GPT-4," "LLama-2", "Falcon").
6.  **Design Elements:** Incorporate as many professional design elements as possible to make the UI look polished and suitable for a VC pitch.  Use modern fonts, spacing, and visual cues to enhance the user experience.

Ensure the code is well-structured, commented, and easy to maintain. The entire UI should be contained within a single HTML file, with embedded CSS and JavaScript for simplicity. No external libraries are necessary.  DO NOT USE PLACEHOLDER OR RANDOM NAMES! This is for a VC pitch, make sure everything is realistic and looks presentable.

Since all code generation and execution happen automatically with CoderAgent, ensure all code is complete and functional in the first pass.

nodes.description: Beautify generated HTML/JS/CSS for LLM Chat UI into a markdown report.
nodes.agent_prompt: Format the HTML, Javascript and CSS code from `code_step_T001` into a well-structured markdown report, with clear sections for HTML, Javascript and CSS code. Additionally, include the execution results from `execution_result_T001`, and highlight any key features or functionalities of the LLM Chat UI implemented in the code. Make the report easy to read and follow. Include all the features of the final output, e.g., the final look of the chat UI, the dropdown options, the chat history examples, etc. Do not summarize the code, show full examples!
